Sentencas: Chromia-forming ferritic stainless steels are being considered for interconnect applications in planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks because of their low cost and physical properties.
Titulo: Thermal stability and oxidation resistance of TiCrAlYO coatings on SS430 for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: At high temperatures, ferritic steels lack environmental stability in the SOFC operating environment, and gradually degrade the cell stack performance.
Titulo: Thermal stability and oxidation resistance of TiCrAlYO coatings on SS430 for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: In this study, an effective, dense and well adherent TiCrAlYO coating was deposited on an SS430 alloy using the filtered arc deposition technique.
Titulo: Thermal stability and oxidation resistance of TiCrAlYO coatings on SS430 for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: High-energy ion backscattering was used to characterize the composition and the thermal stability of the coatings.
Titulo: Thermal stability and oxidation resistance of TiCrAlYO coatings on SS430 for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The chromium volatility of the coated steel plates at 800 degrees C was also measured using ion beam analysis.
Titulo: Thermal stability and oxidation resistance of TiCrAlYO coatings on SS430 for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: Significant reductions in oxidation rates as well as reduced Cr volatility were observed for the coated alloys.
Titulo: Thermal stability and oxidation resistance of TiCrAlYO coatings on SS430 for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications
Thermal stability and oxidation resistance of TiCrAlYO coatings on SS430 for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications
Thermal stability and oxidation resistance of TiCrAlYO coatings on SS430 for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications
